camftimemanager.name: Time Manager
camftimemanager.description: Time Manager is a plugin that helps you calculate and display time as a counter, with or without a time limit, or as a countdown. You can display the time in different ways like in hours, minutes, seconds and/or milliseconds. You can reset your time instance, pause it and resume it whenever you wish to!

ıscounterfinished1.description: If the counter has reached its designated value, if applicable.

ıscounterpaused2.description: If the counter is currently paused.

ıscounterrunning4.description: If the counter is currently running.

ıscounterstopped5.description: If the counter is currently stopped.

checkcountervalue6.description: Checks the counter value with the options given.

check_state7.name: Check state
check_state7.desc: Choose the type of check you want to make. '<' means smaller than, '>', '!=' means not equal to and '==' means equal to.

timecountdown0.display-text: {1} is counting down from {0} ms and set to {2}
timecountdown0.description: Time countdown function that starts at a given value and stops at 0 (zero)

countdown_time0.name: Countdown time
countdown_time0.desc: Enter time to countdown from (in milliseconds)

state4.name: State
state4.desc: Set state if you want the counter to run from start, or if you want to start it manually later.

timecountup1.display-text: {0} is counting up and set to {1}
timecountup1.description: Time count function that keeps counting

state3.name: State
state3.desc: Set state if you want the counter to run from start, or if you want to start it manually later.

timecountupwithlimit2.display-text: {1} is counting up to {0} ms and set to {2}
timecountupwithlimit2.description: Time count function that counts up to a given value

max_count_time0.name: Max count time
max_count_time0.desc: Enter time to count to (in milliseconds)

state4.name: State
state4.desc: Set state if you want the counter to run from start, or if you want to start it manually later.

pausetimecount4.description: Function that pauses or resumes a counter.

state3.name: State
state3.desc: Set state if you want to pause the counter, or if you want to resume a already paused counter.

resettimecount5.display-text: {my} has resetted {0} to its original value
resettimecount5.description: Restarts a counter to its orginal given value.

destroytimemanagerınstances6.display-text: {my} has destroyed all Time Manager instances
destroytimemanagerınstances6.description: Removes all Time Manager instances from the system

stoptimecount7.description: Time count function that starts a counter. The counter will start from given default value.

starttimecount8.description: Time count function that stops a counter. The counter will be reverted to the given default value.

pausetimecount9.description: Function that pauses or resumes a counter.

state3.name: State
state3.desc: Set state if you want to pause the counter, or if you want to resume a already paused counter.

resettimecount10.display-text: {my} has resetted {0} to its original value
resettimecount10.description: Resets a counter to its orginal given value.

setminutebasevalue11.display-text: {0} has changed minute base value to {1}
setminutebasevalue11.description: Sets the base value that the counter uses to calculate the minute and hour value.

setsecondbasevalue12.display-text: {0} has changed second base value to {1}
setsecondbasevalue12.description: Sets the base value that the counter uses to calculate the second and minute value.

setmillisecondbasevalue13.display-text: {0} has changed millisecond base value to {1}
setmillisecondbasevalue13.description: Sets the base value that the counter uses to calculate the millisecond and seconds value.

removesinglecounter14.description: Removes a single counter from the system.

timecountupwithstartvalue15.display-text: {0} is counting up from {2} and set to {1}
timecountupwithstartvalue15.description: Time count function that starts at a given value and then keeps counting

state3.name: State
state3.desc: Set state if you want the counter to run from start, or if you want to start it manually later.

calculatetimevalue16.display-text: {0} recalculates the time value using {1} and the value {2}
calculatetimevalue16.description: Function that calculates a value with the given counter

calculation3.name: Calculation
calculation3.desc: Choose which calculation you want to use.

value4.name: Value
value4.desc: Enter value you want to calculate the time counter with (in milliseconds).

getstringhmsmtimevalue1.description: Get the Hour/Minute/Second/Millisecond time value as a string for a time counter

getstringhmstimevalue8.description: Get the Hour/Minute/Second time value as a string for a time counter

getstringmsmtimevalue2.description: Get the Minute/Second/Millisecond time value as a string for a time counter

getstringmstimevalue7.description: Get the Minute/Second time value as a string for a time counter

getstringsmtimevalue3.description: Get the Second/Millisecond time value as a string for a time counter

getstringstimevalue4.description: Get the Seconds time value as a string for a time counter

getstringmtimevalue5.description: Get the Milliseconds time value as a string for a time counter

gettimevalue6.description: Get the time in milliseconds as a Number

hhmmssmm9.description: Get Hour/Minute/Second/Millisecond time value as a string. Adds a '0' in front for values under the value 10.

hhmmss10.description: Get Hour/Minute/Second time value as a string. Adds a '0' in front for values under the value 10.

mmssmm11.description: Get Minute/Second/Millisecond time value as a string. Adds a '0' in front for values under the value 10.

mmss12.description: Get Minute/Second time value as a string. Adds a '0' in front for values under the value 10.

ssmm13.description: Get Second/Millisecond time value as a string. Adds a '0' in front for values under the value 10.

seconds14.description: Get Second time value as a string. Adds a '0' in front for Second under the value 10.

singleseconds19.description: Get Second time value as a string. It DOES NOT add a '0' in front for seconds under the value 10.

milliseconds15.description: Get Millisecond time value as a string. Adds extra '0' in front for value under the value 100/10.

hmmssmm16.description: Get Hour/Minute/Second/Millisecond time value as a string. It DOES NOT add a '0' in front for Hour under the value 10.

hmssmm17.description: Get Hour/Minute/Second/Millisecond time value as a string. It DOES NOT add a '0' in front for Hour/Minute under the value 10.

hmsmm18.description: Get Hour/Minute/Second/Millisecond time value as a string. It DOES NOT add a '0' in front for Hour/Minute/Second under the value 10.

convertnumbertohhmmssmm20.description: Get Hour/Minute/Second/Millisecond time value as a string. It adds a '0' in front for Hour/Minute/Second/Milliseconds under the value 10.

timevalue0.name: TimeValue
timevalue0.desc: Enter time value you wish to convert

timevalue0.desc: Enter time value you wish to convert

timevalue0.desc: Enter time value you wish to convert

timevalue0.desc: Enter time value you wish to convert

convertnumbertohmmss25.description: Get Hour/Minute/Second time value as a string. It adds a '0' in front for Minute/Second under the value 10.
